name: Central Library
description: A vast collection of books, journals, and digital resources to fuel your knowledge.

name: Computer Labs
description: Labs equipped with high-speed internet and necessary software tools for practical learning.

name: Sports Complex
description: Facilities for cricket, football, basketball, and indoor games.

name: Transportation
description: Convenient bus facility covering major routes of the city.

name: Cafeteria
description: Hygienic and nutritious food served in a vibrant environment.

name: Wi-Fi Campus
description: Internet connectivity available throughout the campus.

name: Auditorium
description: Auditorium with a seating capacity of 500 for events and seminars.

name: Medical Center
description: Medical assistance available for students and staff.

name: Seminar Halls
description: Halls with AV facilities for department-level workshops.

name: Green Impetus
description: Solar power plant, rainwater harvesting, and gardens.
